Title: Slime Boukenki: Umi da, Yeah!
Description: ['A short anime directed by Yuasa Masaaki with Production IG, distributed on VHS as a bonus to a video game magazine subscription.  The main character is a Slime from the Dragon Quest video games.']
Related: ['Parent story: Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory', 'Prequel: Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory - The Mayfly of Space']
